info.title: License API
info.description:
API for retrieving licenses. This API provides information about licenses, including their names, product IDs, billing details, and associated features.

| Field         | Type     | Description                         |
|---------------|----------|-------------------------------------|
| status        | boolean  | Status of the operation.            |
| data          | array    | Array of license objects.           |

### License Object

The license object has the following properties:

| Field         | Type     | Description                         |
|---------------|----------|-------------------------------------|
| name          | string   | Name of the license.                |
| productId     | string   | Product ID of the license.         |
| rule          | object   | License rule details.               |
| type          | string   | Type of the license.                |
| description   | string   | Description of the license.        |
| billingPeriod | string   | Billing period of the license.     |
| orderIndex    | integer  | Order index of the license.         |
| items         | array    | Array of license item objects.      |
| feature       | object   | License feature details.            |

### License Rule Object

The license rule object contains details about the rules associated with the license. It has the following properties:

| Field                 | Type     | Description                                               |
|-----------------------|----------|-----------------------------------------------------------|
| taskLimit             | string   | Task limit per month.                                    |
| allowExtraTask        | boolean  | Flag to indicate if extra tasks are allowed.             |
| visitLimit            | string   | Routing limit per month.                                 |
| allowExtraVisit       | boolean  | Flag to indicate if extra visits are allowed.           |
| automationLimit       | string   | Automation limit per month.                              |
| allowExtraAutomation  | boolean  | Flag to indicate if extra automations are allowed.       |
| userLimit             | integer  | User limit.                                              |
| allowExtraUser        | boolean  | Flag to indicate if extra users are allowed.            |
| dataRetention         | string   | Data retention period.                                   |
| customRole            | string   | Custom role value.                                       |
| teams                 | boolean  | Flag to indicate if teams are allowed.                  |
| imageQuality          | string   | Image quality setting.                                   |
| dataSourceTypeLimit   | string   | Data source type limit.                                  |
| allowExtraDataSourceType | boolean  | Flag to indicate if extra data source types are allowed. |
| sla                   | boolean  | Flag to indicate if SLA is included.                    |
| sso                   | boolean  | Flag to indicate if SSO is included.                    |
| privacyPolicy         | string   | Privacy policy setting.                                  |
| useBigData            | boolean  | Flag to indicate if Big Data access is included.         |
| professionalService   | boolean  | Flag to indicate if professional services are included.  |
| minimumContract       | string   | Minimum contract setting.                                |

### License Item Object

The license item object represents individual items associated with the license. It has the following properties:

| Field       | Type     | Description               |
|-------------|----------|---------------------------|
| priceId     | string   | Price ID of the item.     |
| name        | string   | Name of the item.         |
| mainPrice   | integer  | Main price of the item.   |
| extraPrice  | integer  | Extra price of the item.  |

### License Feature Object

The license feature object provides details about various features associated with the license. It has properties for different features:

| Field         | Type     | Description                         |
|---------------|----------|-------------------------------------|
| taskLimit     | object   | Task limit feature details.         |
| visitLimit    | object   | Routing limit feature details.      |
| automationLimit | object  | Automation limit feature details.   |
| userLimit     | object   | User limit feature details.         |
| dataRetention | object   | Data retention feature details.     |
| customRole    | object   | Custom role feature details.        |
| teams         | object   | Teams feature details.              |
| imageQuality  | object   | Image quality feature details.      |
| dataSourceTypeLimit | object | Data source type limit feature details. |
| sla           | object   | SLA feature details.                |
| sso           | object   | SSO feature details.                |
| privacyPolicy | object   | Privacy policy feature details.      |
| useBigData    | object   | Dashboard feature details.          |
| professionalService | object | Professional service feature details. |
| minimumContract | object  | Minimum contract feature details.   |

Each feature object contains properties like title, value, description, textValue, and allowExtra, providing detailed information about the respective feature.

parameters.name: clearCache
parameters.description: Clear the cache for license information.

data.name: Free
data.description: Get to know MileApp. Manage up to 100 tasks/month with full mobile app capabilities. Free forever

taskLimit.title: Task limit / month
taskLimit.description: Maximize task creation within your billing cycle. Exceeding this limit incurs additional charges.

visitLimit.title: Routing limit / month
visitLimit.description: Optimize visits up to a set limit. Beyond that, extra routing incurs additional costs.

automationLimit.title: Automation limit / month
automationLimit.description: Simplify task management with automatic processes.

dataRetention.description: We store your data for a specified duration.
